turns.response:
To calculate 15 percent of 47 dollars, we can use the formula:

$$
\text{Percentage} = \left( \frac{\text{Percent}}{100} \right) \times \text{Number}
$$

Plugging in the values:

$$
\text{15 percent of 47} = \left( \frac{15}{100} \right) \times 47 = 0.15 \times 47 = 7.05
$$

So, 15 percent of 47 dollars is **$7.05**.
$7.05 divided by 3 is $2.35.
